explanation: [0-0] On an empty asphalt road, a young woman wearing a white top, camouflage pants, and a black helmet is holding the handlebars of a motorcycle with both hands. Her body is suspended in the air, lifting the front wheel of the motorcycle high.
[0-2] As the helmeted woman controls the motorcycle and glides forward a certain distance, she stands still, the front of the motorcycle still raised.
